drupalNodeEvent.title: Book launch: Made in Hong Kong: Transpacific Networks and a New History of Globalization (Columbia UP)

field_speakers.processed: Peter E. Hamilton (Trinity College Dublin),Elizabeth Sinn (HKU),John M. Carroll (HKU),John D. Wong (HKU),Pete Millwood (HKU)

field_description.processed: The HKU Society of Fellows in the Humanities, in collaboration with the HKU History Department, are excited to host Peter E. Hamilton (Trinity College Dublin), who will speak about his new book Made in Hong Kong: Transpacific Networks and a New History of Globalization (Columbia University Press, 2021).
